osvSchema.details: Vulnerability in the Oracle Trade Management product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: GL Accounts LOV).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.13. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Trade Management.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Trade Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

descriptions.value: Vulnerability in the Oracle Trade Management product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: GL Accounts LOV).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.13. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Trade Management.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Trade Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

Vulnerabilidad en el producto Oracle Trade Management de Oracle E-Business Suite (componente: GL Accounts LOV). Las versiones compatibles que se ven afectadas son 12.2.3-12.2.13. Una vulnerabilidad fácilmente explotable permite que un atacante no autenticado con acceso a la red a través de HTTP comprometa Oracle Trade Management. Los ataques exitosos a esta vulnerabilidad pueden resultar en un acceso no autorizado a datos críticos o un acceso completo a todos los datos accesibles de Oracle Trade Management. CVSS 3.1 Puntaje base 7.5 (Impactos en la confidencialidad). Vector CVSS: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
